mapper.sql: resourcePrimKey, refererResourcePrimKey, status, groupId, categoryId, plid, displayDate, userId, userName, title, urlTitle, mobileTitle, url
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from cmspublishedarticle
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into cmspublishedarticle (resourcePrimKey, refererResourcePrimKey, status, groupId, categoryId, plid, displayDate, userId, userName, title, urlTitle, mobileTitle, url) values (#{resourceprimkey,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{refererresourceprimkey,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{plid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{displaydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobiletitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cmspublishedarticle

refererResourcePrimKey,
status,
groupId,
categoryId,

mapper.update:
update cmspublishedarticle
resourcePrimKey = #{record.resourceprimkey,jdbcType=BIGINT},
refererResourcePrimKey = #{record.refererresourceprimkey,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
groupId = #{record.groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
categoryId = #{record.categoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
plid = #{record.plid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
displayDate = #{record.displaydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
userId = #{record.userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
userName = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urlTitle = #{record.urltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobileTitle = #{record.mobiletitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{record.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

refererResourcePrimKey = #{refererresourceprimkey,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
groupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
categoryId = #{categoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mobileTitle = #{mobiletitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where resourcePrimKey = #{resourceprimkey,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cmspublishedarticle set refererResourcePrimKey = #{refererresourceprimkey,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, groupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, categoryId = #{categoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, plid = #{plid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, displayDate = #{displaydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urlTitle = #{urltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobileTitle = #{mobiletitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where resourcePrimKey = #{resourceprimkey,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select distinct categoryName from Articlecategory where cateGoryFlag = #{cateGoryFlag}
select top 10 'test' as name, 'baidu.com' as url from Articlecategory
